origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenEnergyAPI.analyze_stocks', 'description': 'This function analyzes green energy stocks based on the stock type, analysis period, and risk level.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'stockType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of stocks, e.g., green_energy, renewable.'}, {'name': 'analysisPeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period for analysis, e.g., 1_year, 5_years.'}, {'name': 'riskLevel', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The desired risk level for the investment.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'The detailed analysis report of the green energy stocks.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenEnergyAPI.analyze_stocks, 它的参数输入如下: 'stockType'是'green_energy', 'analysisPeriod'是'1_year', 'riskLevel'是'high'.
